title: Document AI - Regional and multi-regional support
abstract:
# Document AI - Regional and multi-regional support
# Regional and multi-regional support
You must specify either a regional or multi-regional [location](/about/locations) for data storage and document processing.
Document AI supports the following multi-region locations:
- `us`(United States)
- `eu`(Europe)
Document AI provides limited support for the following single-region locations:
**Note:** Single-region locations support a subset of limited-access processors. To seek access, submit the [Document AI Single Region Request Form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf_s593-akFXQdqB7sQWZN8LFFZ4qnuS4fhF1ZrLyf8cKOSWA/viewform?resourcekey=0-PC3Kf5_u0KQXMuNJrDdDnA) with information about you, your company, and your use case. A Google Cloud project ID is required.
- `asia-south1`(Mumbai)
- `asia-southeast1`(Singapore)
- `australia-southeast1`(Sydney)
- `europe-west2`(London)
- `europe-west3`(Frankfurt)
- `northamerica-northeast1`(Montréal)
You can follow instructions for [setup the regions API](/document-ai/docs/setup#locations) .
Document AI is offered with varying capabilities by region. ( [Full list of processors](/document-ai/docs/processors-list) ):
| Capability        | us | eu | asia-south1 | asia-southeast1 | australia-southeast1 | europe-west2 | europe-west3 | northamerica-northeast1 |
|:-----------------------------------------|-----:|-----:|--------------:|------------------:|-----------------------:|---------------:|---------------:|--------------------------:|
| OCR          | nan | nan |   nan |    nan |     nan |   nan |   nan |      nan |
| Custom extractor (CDE1)     | nan | nan |   nan |    nan |     nan |   nan |   nan |      nan |
| Custom extractor (CDE2)     | nan | nan |   nan |    nan |     nan |   nan |   nan |      nan |
| Custom extractor (CDE2 with fine tuning) | nan | nan |   nan |    nan |     nan |   nan |   nan |      nan |
| Custom classifier      | nan | nan |   nan |    nan |     nan |   nan |   nan |      nan |
| Custom splitter       | nan | nan |   nan |    nan |     nan |   nan |   nan |      nan |
| Form Parser        | nan | nan |   nan |    nan |     nan |   nan |   nan |      nan
